AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: medical resident
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: After gaining [PAWN_possessive] medical degree, [PAWN_nameDef] became a medical resident on a multispecies research installation. [PAWN_pronoun] was timid but had a pure, kind heart. [PAWN_pronoun] gradually gained confidence in [PAWN_objective]self and [PAWN_possessive] abilities, even though [PAWN_pronoun] wasn't able to finish the residency.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: medical student
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was happiest working and playing alone as a kit. In [PAWN_possessive] late teens, [PAWN_pronoun] suffered a severe work injury — [PAWN_pronoun]'s never said exactly what — that left cosmetic scars along [PAWN_possessive] back. [PAWN_pronoun] was inspired by the advanced care the doctors gave [PAWN_objective] and enrolled in medical school shortly after.
